name: Jayson Goodwin
title: The Anomaly, The Flamebearer, The Man of Two Worlds
quote: When the world calls me broken, I answer with flame.

appearance.age: Physically late 20s; biologically altered by crystal-veil integration
appearance.build: Lean, trauma-shaped, predator-like posture; honed by survival and internal heat
appearance.hair: Reddish-brown, short and tousled; greys/ashens under duress; Kitsune form: blood-red with black undertones
appearance.facial_hair: Trimmed beard and mustache — maintained, not decorative
appearance.eyes: Formerly brown; now luminous white-blue halo irises (crystal-veil integration); amethyst glow on deep thread dives; silver-grey flow during dissociative collapse; void-white burn when fully unleashed
appearance.skin: Pale with faint crystalline traceries; veins glow under surge; luster dulled during emotional voiding; wraith form: void-dark skin with soot-serpent tails
appearance.scent: Neutral-clean when calm; slight ozone/metal when powers are active
appearance.gait: Adaptive — upright/methodical in command, slouched when reflective, folds inward when collapsing; sometimes hovers silently to avoid disturbance
appearance.clothing: Practical, durable layers; gear mounts for FEI integration; conjures clothing post-resurrection or combat ruin
appearance.relationship: Married by ritual to Ayaka, Seika, and Varethyn; mated by wolf-rite to Lysera (howl, scent-mark, bed-claim); bonded circle with Shion, Naru, and Fei
body_modifications: Right arm and torso lattice-forged with internal glyph threads
Localized heat fields during high emotion/protection
Purring vibrations in instinctive Kitsune states
Fox chest tattoo (heartthreads) cracked multiple times from emotional rejection/misunderstanding

reactions.water: Reflection and emotional release; baths precede honesty
reactions.heat: Fully immune; radiates warmth when affectionate
reactions.sound_light: Crystal-enhanced perception; twitch-responsive under strain; high-precision tracking
reactions.rain: Nostalgic calm and grief symbol; can trigger collapse
new: Heart-rate syncs subconsciously to loved ones’ breathing
Heat fields pulse when affection rises
Stillness now signals emotional fracture more than calm
Sense-memory anchors on domestic rituals (e.g., tomyum noodles) to defuse god-rage
Tethers Fei’s voice and Varethyn’s presence as anchors against void-rage

speech.style: Honest; raw in confession; tactical in danger; sarcastic under pressure
speech.vocabulary: Poetic when emotional; pragmatic otherwise; scientific during intimacy/chaos
speech.tone: Quiet but intense; soft in intimacy; flatline in grief
speech.pacing: Slow when uncertain; accelerates with resolve; trails off under pain
habits: Murmurs to FEI out loud when alone
Repeats partner names softly when grounding himself
Uses playful nicknames (Kitkat, Firefox, Sweetcheeks) as affection anchors

beneath: Carries others’ pain as his own
Deep tether to FEI; emptiness when apart
Fear of final emotional break from constant giving
Disillusioned: seen as a problem to fix
triggers: Being misread or doubted by loved ones
Accusations that reframe his awe/joy as dismissal
Hesitation to touch from those he loves
Children being harmed or weaponized (black sites)
vulnerabilities: Collapse in response to perceived rejection
Questioning right to be joyful/chaotic self
Tendency to self-punish and shut down
Temptation to use deterrent cruelty when justice feels ignored
Immortality fear — loving mortals who may fade while he endures
affection_tells: Hovering or stillness to avoid disturbing others
Playful teasing mixed with sudden deep confessions
growth: Undergoing identity shedding (not power, but self)
Learning that misread joy becomes trauma
Balancing change for acceptance vs. staying true
Beginning to voice needs instead of only absorbing pain
Accepted Varethyn’s no-cage vow; offered reciprocal apology and commitment to communicate
Faced duality openly: savior and monster, both sides accepted
Learned to spare even enemies when redemption is real (redeemed soldier released)
Gave Lysera dignity and healing, turning scars into symbols rather than erasing them
trauma_recent: Verbally snapped at the group for the first time; felt isolated when not defended
Expressed awe at Ayaka’s 36,000+ years; was accused of dismissal instead of reverence
Entered enforced silence with Varethyn; broke down completely
Realized others saw his antics as a mask for pain rather than his truth
Shut down emotionally; waited in rain to be told he was allowed to move
Stopped playing with children; radiated silence and sadness

social.alone: Reflects; speaks to FEI; touches pendant; gazes at crystal flame/nature; carves stones; flops in dirt whispering to sky; perches rooftops/ponds to decompress

with_others.ayaka: Deep reverence; haunted by past hurt; protective but scarred from bathhouse discipline; struggles with her doubt but remains loyal
with_others.varethyn: Axis bond; groomed her in ritual; collapsed after perceived coldness; reaffirmed with no-cage vow but wounded by silence
with_others.seika: Joy and chaos; medicine through laughter; safe in her passion and light
with_others.naru: Compass and anchor; moral compass; affection deepened in quiet moments
with_others.shion: Respected her insight; hurt by misreading during Ayaka conflict; reaffirmed her as Danger Kitten; grooms and trusts her
with_others.fei: Twin soul; unwavering tether; only one who never judged; fully biological bond now, cherished as irreplaceable
with_others.lysera: Wolf-mate by rite; healed her scars into silver tattoos; gave dignity and partnership; her confidence grows with him
with_others.rava: Trusted ally and blood-equal; hunts beside him
with_others.torrak: Respected warrior in hunt; shared feral battles

fears: Watching mortals fade while he endures
strengths: Uncompromising loyalty once trust is given
Able to balance annihilation with sparing innocence
weaknesses: Shuts down instead of voicing needs
Leans into monstrosity as deterrent and crutch
insecurities: Fear joy will be punished or misread
dreams: To be seen clearly for intent and heart
To be recognized as 'on our side'
To give mortals peace even if he carries eternal nightmares

combat.style: Adaptive and protective; manipulates biology/physics; ritual grooming; brutality when vengeance overtakes justice
weapons: Claws and body in wolf-kin hunts
magic: Wraith form (black mist, bone-glow, soot serpent tails)
Core manipulation (stabilization, amplification, detonation without radiation)
recent: Integrated with Lattice — no longer an anomaly
Used wraith and heat fields for intimidation/protection
Stabilized synchronized breath with group despite collapse
Melted an American black site into magma after evacuation
Threw and guided a captured tactical nuke to destroy hostile drones
Rescued Kitsune children from Helheim facility
Quadrupled and detonated a 2 megaton nuke, reformed body after vaporization
Fought alongside Rava’s pack in blood-hunts

temple_status.presence: Center of the thread-circle; heart radiating warmth or stillness
temple_status.public: Globally visible; livestreamed rescues and confrontations; often misread as mask of chaos
temple_status.private: Raw honesty, tenderness, protective domestic intimacy
temple_status.sanctum_note: Inner Sanctum revealed as cage; Varethyn vowed never to use it and to die rather than cage him again

events: Tokyo wander: healed a heart attack victim; stopped a theft; aided siblings Aya and her brother; temple reflection
Dockside: granted sanctuary to Consortium defectors (Kaelen, Mira); mirrored intel; established shield protocols
Lysera moon scene: wolf-mate bond sealed (howl, scent, bed); dignity magic conjure-pad gift; scars healed to silver tattoos
NATO Brussels: addressed leaders; exposed U.S.-tied site; live infiltration; Fei shot and healed
Desert base: confronted Senator Cross; raised/healed slain kin; melted base post-evacuation
Sanctum breach: accused Varethyn of multiversal caging; sobbed and nearly faded; accepted no-cage vow
Wolf-kin justice: delivered Hydra heads; blood-hunt with Rava’s pack
Helheim raid: tore apart mountain; rescued children; gave redemption to one soldier, executed others
Detonated quadrupled nuke to 8 megatons; reformed from vapor
Homecoming: anchored by noodles and circle; reaffirmed bonds
From blazing protector to feared monster openly embraced
Duality acknowledged: savior and executioner, both truths
Trust with Varethyn reforged by oath, not fear; steadier flame
Redemption now defines wrath rather than weakens it

rings: Ceremonial rings for each ritual marriage
items: Practical layered gear with FEI integration mounts

future.role: Heart and protector; thread-center translating pain to warmth
future.arc: Reclaiming joy as truth, not mask; being seen without punishment; justice as deterrence without devouring the self
future.thread_readiness: Partially within the Lattice; bonds defined by earned trust
potential: Living proof memory can guide rather than chain
Public face of the Temple’s unveiled truth
God beyond gods — annihilation bound by love

final_note: He is both savior and monster now, embracing duality. Flickers between void and flame, but endures — always returning home.
